text: Hi! After making changes to my repo, I open up Julia REPL and run `serve()` after importing Franklin. Is this possible without launching the REPL and doing it directly on the CLI?

text: I like to use `julia -ie 'using Franklin; Franklin.serve()`. Thanks to using `e`, Julia will remain open in interactive mode even when Franklin stops. When Franklin has errored out, you can call `Franklin.serve()`  again without having to reload Julia and all the packages.
